sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lao zhai 勞瘵 , exhaustion consumption. Pu ji fang 普濟方 233: 外觸風寒， 內傷氣血，表裏受病，陰陽相搏，久而不瘳，遂成羸瘵 , “If on the outside one is struck by wind and cold, and if inside qi and blood are harmed, the outside and inside are affected by disease; yin and yang strike each other. If this is not cured for an extended period of time, it will result in emaciation with consumption ”.
